##fileformat=VCFv4.2
##INFO=<ID=GENE,Number=1,Type=String,Description="Gene name">
##INFO=<ID=STRAND,Number=1,Type=String,Description="Gene strand">
##INFO=<ID=SVLEN,Number=.,Type=Integer,Description="Difference in length between REF and ALT alleles">
##INFO=<ID=CDS,Number=1,Type=String,Description="CDS annotation (modified)">
##INFO=<ID=AA,Number=1,Type=String,Description="Peptide annotation (modified)">
##INFO=<ID=AR,Number=1,Type=Float,Description="Allelic Ratio">
##INFO=<ID=AF,Number=1,Type=Float,Description="Allele Frequency">
##INFO=<ID=DP,Number=1,Type=Float,Description="Total Depth">
##INFO=<ID=VD,Number=1,Type=Float,Description="Variant Depth">
##INFO=<ID=AAR,Number=1,Type=Float,Description="Adjusted Allelic Ratio (Max Estimate)">
##INFO=<ID=AAF,Number=1,Type=Float,Description="Adjusted Allele Frequency (Max Estimate)">
##INFO=<ID=RAR,Number=1,Type=Float,Description="Raw Allelic Ratio">
##INFO=<ID=RAF,Number=1,Type=Float,Description="Raw Allele Frequency">
##INFO=<ID=RDP,Number=1,Type=Float,Description="Raw Total Depth">
##INFO=<ID=RVD,Number=1,Type=Float,Description="Raw Variant Depth">
##INFO=<ID=SAMPLE,Number=1,Type=String,Description="Sample name">
##FORMAT=<ID=CR,Number=6,Type=Integer,Description="Coverage Radius">
##FORMAT=<ID=DB,Number=.,Type=String,Description="Duplicated Baits (among fwdP1-P3, revP1-P3, other)">
##FORMAT=<ID=NB,Number=.,Type=String,Description="Non-binding Baits">
##FORMAT=<ID=RB,Number=.,Type=String,Description="Reaching Baits capturing mut + wt junctions in R2 (unambiguous)">
##FORMAT=<ID=AFB,Number=7,Type=Float,Description="Allele frequency by Baits">
##FORMAT=<ID=Fwd1,Number=1,Type=String,Description="AF details for bait Fwd1">
##FORMAT=<ID=Fwd2,Number=1,Type=String,Description="AF details for bait Fwd2">
##FORMAT=<ID=Fwd3,Number=1,Type=String,Description="AF details for bait Fwd3">
##FORMAT=<ID=Rev1,Number=1,Type=String,Description="AF details for bait Rev1">
##FORMAT=<ID=Rev2,Number=1,Type=String,Description="AF details for bait Rev2">
##FORMAT=<ID=Rev3,Number=1,Type=String,Description="AF details for bait Rev3">
##FORMAT=<ID=Oth,Number=1,Type=String,Description="AF details for reads not assigned to a bait">
#CHROM	POS	ID	REF	ALT	QUAL	FILTER	INFO	FORMAT
